bike.description: A6-SL alloy, custom-butted and aero shaped down tube & seat tube w/ rear wheel recess, hydroformed top tube, forged, rear entry dropouts
sizes: S (49cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (61cm)

components.description: A6-SL alloy aero seat stays w/ ride tuned chainstay, forged rear entry dropout
FC-440 aero full carbon w/ 1 1/8" steerer
Shimano Dura Ace TT bar end type, 20-speed
Oval 330 aero alloy, 30mm rims, DT Swiss Champion spokes 20/24H, precision ground hubs
Oval 500 forged alloy, dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Profile T2 Wing base bar, T2 Plus extensions
Selle Italia T1 w/ FeC alloy rails
